member.name: T:CarbonTechnologies.StringManipulator
member.summary: Main static class for string manipulation

member.name: M:CarbonTechnologies.StringManipulator.FindStringBetween2Strings(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Finds the string in between. Ex: mainstring = "This is a bunch of instance words.", firstring = "This is a", secondstring = "instance", RETURNS: " bunch of "
member.param: This is the string main string that will be searched
First string (will be excluded from the returning string)
Second string (will be excluded from the returning string)
member.returns: Return the string between 1st and 2nd strings on mainstring

member.name: M:CarbonTechnologies.StringManipulator.GetFileNameFromFullPath(System.String)
member.summary: Return pure file name from full path information. Ex. FullPath: "C:\Users\Public\myfilet.txt", RETURNS: "myfile.txt"

members.member:
Returns the text removed version of the main string."
Main String /// The Text/String which will be removed from the Main String File name with extension
